body:
Heeeeeya guys welcome here's Rack on a avicus letsplay.
na

So I'm suggesting that Tournament 3 registrations should be on this Month, April.
Why? I already told then to Tazz, ( If you want them just tell me here lol ).
What I want is your opinion if TM registrations should start this Month or on May.

Ty.

title: Why TM3 Registrations should be on April

replies.body: First of all, no shit Avicus =/= OCN. By the time Atlas is ready to be used and enough quality maps have implemented its potential, it will be around the time the OCN tourney starts. Assuming we need at least 2 weeks to register and at least 2-4 weeks for the tourney, it's not practical to start the tournament before or during OCN's.

replies.body:
I'd rather wait more time for a good tournament than having a tournament that's been rushed.
Also, as the others have said, incorporating Atlas to the maps would add better concepts and gameplay.
